text:
@TheRickWilson Petrie dish. He did not wear a mask and infected so many people. We will never reopen when Trump, VP, Ivanka and Kushner are infecting every one and possibly killing people. They do not value life and do not care if they are killing people. Shame on these murderers.
#COVID19
